title: Integration of network pharmacology and experimental verifications reveals the Bian-Se-Tong mixture can alleviate constipation in STC rats by reducing apoptosis of Cajal cells via activating PI3K-Akt signaling pathway
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Rong Wu, Zhibin Zhang, Qingxia Xu, Fang Liu, Yu Zhan, Qiuxiao Wang, Lijuan Du, Xuegui Tang
